text: Brian J. Bamford (18 December 1935 â€“ 25 June 2021) was an English professional golfer. He won the Schweppes PGA Close Championship in 1961. He was the father of Sue Bamford, a professional golfer who, in 1977, reached the final of the Girls Amateur Championship, losing to Wilma Aitken. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British golfers Category:Sportspeople from Surrey
title: Brian Bamford
